title: Dolor Amarus
content:
Dolor Amarus Rare 3~6 Damage 1d4 +2 Piercing Dolor Amarus: When you land a Critical Hit with this weapon, it deals an additional 7 damage. Weapon Enchantment +2 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: Once wielded by a murderer, the weapon's handle retains an eerie, clammy warmth, as if Dolor's pre-slaughter sweat somehow crept into the leather - and lingers there still. Dagger Light Finesse Thrown 0.45 190

Dolor Amarus: When you land a Critical Hit with this weapon, it deals an additional 7
